faqSubtitle: Have questions? We've got answers. If you can't find what you're looking for, feel free to contact us.
faqQ1Title: How do I book a dormitory room?
faqQ1Answer: To book a dormitory, navigate to the 'Dormitories' page, select your desired check-in and check-out dates, and choose an available room. Then, simply fill out the booking form with your personal details.
faqQ2Title: How can my company book a training hall?
faqQ2Answer: To book a hall or section, your company representative must first register an account through the 'Register Company' link on the login page. Once the account is approved by our administration, you can log in to your company dashboard to view and book available facilities.
faqQ3Answer: We primarily accept payments via manual bank transfer to the account details provided upon booking. For individual dormitory bookings, you will be asked to upload proof of payment. For company bookings, payment terms will be outlined in the rental agreement.
faqQ4Title: How do I check the status of my dormitory booking?
faqQ4Answer: You can easily check the status of your dormitory booking by visiting the 'Check My Booking' page and entering the phone number you used during the booking process.
faqQ5Title: What are the check-in and check-out times?
faqQ5Answer: Standard check-in time is after 2:00 PM on your arrival date, and check-out is before 12:00 PM (noon) on your departure date. Please contact us if you require special arrangements.
faqQ6Title: Can I cancel or modify my booking?
faqQ6Answer: To cancel or modify a booking, please contact our administration office directly. Please note that cancellations may be subject to a fee depending on how far in advance they are made. Refer to your booking agreement for specific terms.
faqQ7Title: Are catering services available for all bookings?
faqQ7Answer: Catering services (lunch and refreshments) are available exclusively for facility bookings (halls and sections). You can select your desired catering level during the booking process for these items.
discoverMoreSubtitle: Scan the QR code with your phone to view our digital brochure and learn more about our facilities and services.
scanForBrochureDesc: Open your camera and point it here!
brochureDormitoriesDesc: Clean, secure, and affordable dormitory rooms suitable for individuals and groups attending training or events.
brochureHallsDesc: Modern, well-equipped halls and sections perfect for trainings, meetings, workshops, and conferences of all sizes.
brochureCateringDesc: Delicious and convenient catering options, including lunch and refreshment packages, to complement your event.
brochureAboutUsContent: Welcome to the {siteName}, the premier destination in the region for educational programs, professional training, and events. Our state-of-the-art facilities are designed to provide a conducive environment for learning, collaboration, and growth. With a range of comfortable dormitories and versatile halls, we are equipped to meet all your accommodation and event needs.
brochureKeyFeaturesMore: ...and much more to ensure your stay and events are successful.
brochureWhyChoosePrimeLocation: Prime, accessible location with a serene and professional atmosphere.
brochureWhyChooseExcellentService: Dedicated staff committed to providing excellent service and support.
brochureWhyChooseCompetitivePricing: Competitive and transparent pricing for all our facilities and services.
brochureWhyChooseCommitmentToQuality: A strong commitment to quality, cleanliness, and security.
brochureCallToActionTitle: Ready to Book or Have Questions?
brochureCallToActionDesc: Contact us today to discuss your requirements or to make a booking. Our team is ready to assist you.
pleaseSelectDateRangeToEnableBooking: Please select a date range to enable booking.
